long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Academic Monitor is a cutting-edge Chrome Extension designed to uphold the principles of academic honesty and integrity among students while using ChatGPT. Through a transparent and secure framework, this extension aids educators in monitoring, researching, and verifying the authenticity of students’ work generated with ChatGPT.

Teacher's Dashboard:
Review & Monitor: Educators can seamlessly review and monitor students’ usage of ChatGPT, gaining insights into their engagement and reliance on the tool.

Search & Filter: With intuitive search and filter options, teachers can easily navigate through student data, making the review process efficient and user-friendly.

Research Support:
Data Collection: For academic researchers, the extension supports ethical and compliant data collection methodologies, facilitating insightful studies on students’ interaction with AI in education.

Anonymization (optional): Ensures that data used for research purposes is anonymized and stripped of personally identifiable information, adhering to privacy standards and ethical norms.
Privacy & Security:
We take data privacy and security seriously. ChatGPT Academic Monitor is designed with robust security measures to protect user data. We are transparent about our data collection practices and committed to complying with all relevant data protection laws and educational privacy standards.
Usage:
Simply install the extension, and it will seamlessly integrate with ChatGPT. For teachers and researchers, a straightforward dashboard is available to review, monitor, and analyze student interactions with ChatGPT, supporting a culture of honesty, transparency, and integrity in education.

Supported Versions:
ChatGPT Academic Monitor is compatible with both ChatGPT 3.5 and 4, ensuring broad usability and functionality across different versions of the ChatGPT platform.

Data Usage Assurance:
We respect and understand the importance of data privacy and usage preferences set by users on the ChatGPT platform. The tool operates effectively even when the chat history and training settings are configured not to allow data usage for improving ChatGPT’s models. Our extension does not use the captured data for any purpose other than the intended academic integrity, research, and authorship verification functionalities, strictly adhering to the user-set preferences and privacy norms.

Support:
For any queries, support, or feedback, please contact our team at li4808@purdue.edu.
